# Add and list tasks
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Buy milk +groceries @home
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add (A) Call mom +family @phone due:2026-01-02

exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list
cmp stdout want-list.txt

-- want-list.txt --
(A) Call mom +family @phone due:2026-01-02
Buy milk +groceries @home
